person:biography.personal-details:content: Sharif Ahmed Qasem received his Bachelor’s degree and Master’s degree in Electronics and wireless communication engineering from Universiti Teknikal Malaysia Melaka (UTeM) in 2015 and 2017, respectively. He is currently working toward the Ph.D. degree in Multimedia University (MMU) in the field of telecommunication and antennas design for wireless communication systems. He has authored a number of research articles in various indexed journals and conference proceedings. His research interests are antennas, filters, and rectifiers for various wireless applications. E-mail: sharifahmed1113@gmail.com
